abstract: The F.B.I.’s involvement adds to the scrutiny surrounding the auspiciously timed options trades, by an investor or investors who have not yet been identified.
snippet: The F.B.I.’s involvement adds to the scrutiny surrounding the auspiciously timed options trades, by an investor or investors who have not yet been identified.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Bureau of Investigation has opened a criminal inquiry into suspicious trades placed ahead of the $23 billion acquisition of H.J. Heinz, a person briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.

headline.main: F.B.I. Said to Be Looking at Suspicious Heinz Trades
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Said to Be Looking at Heinz Trades
